content:
Will any of the talks be live-streamed or recorded?

(I suspect I am not the only one seeing this announcement who would love to attend the meeting, but cannot realistically make travel plans to attend in-person at 2 weeks' notice.)
Will the talks be recorded and put on YouTube?

Typically all talks from the Institut Henri Poincaré appear here
https://www.carmin.tv/en/
after a few days.
The Malinca project website will be updated with links as soon as the recordings become available.
5 messages were moved here from #announce > Kick-off meeting of the Malinca ERC Synergy Project by Riccardo Brasca.
